title: Define Gaming LoL Esports Team > D5+ L4P

embed.description: The site has been fixed, but still requires you to clear your browsing data/cache if you are having issues loading certain objects such as creating new topics on the forum. If you are still having problems after clearing your cache, please let me know.

body:
Define Gaming is looking to expand in the 2016 Season and as such we are looking for members within the Oceanic community to create our first ESports team. Practice times a minimum of three times a week consisting of ranked 5s, analyst/coaching sessions and weekly tournaments such as AU Cybergamer and Razer. If you are looking to get involved in a competitive environment then this just might be the opportunity for you.

**Requirements**

* Diamond in Solo Queue (Season 4 or 5)
* Available to practice a minimum 3 times a week - potentially more
* Able to give and receive constructive criticism and work in a team environment towards a shared goal
* A working microphone with Teamspeak 3 installed
* Age 17+
* Must live in Australia or New Zealand

Application Forum: [Click Here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1X692Cn0Ugp1ASt9hx_LCTfg5VJPtAYJxX9n9iQMMMYQ/viewform)

More information will be available soon. We may also be looking for Coaches/Analysts, if this is also of interest to you then feel free to get in contact with me.
